  • 方法详细资料

    • extractRecipe

      public static Recipe extractRecipe(RecipeModel model) throws Exception
      From model extracts the underlying Recipes
      参数:
      model - The CreateRecipePageModel needed to be parsed
      返回:
      The parsed model
      抛出:
      Exception - The wrong data of the model, also contains reason in the exception message

    • showAlert

      public static boolean showAlert(javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType alertType, String message)

      参数:
      alertType - Type of alert
      message - Message on the new window

    • isImage

      If an address points to an image
